meanings.definition: A photographic printing process that produces a cyan-blue print.
meanings.sent1: I learned about cyanotypes in my photography class.
meanings.sent2: The artist displayed her beautiful cyanotypes at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The cyanotypes looked like magic blueprints from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a canvas, painting memories in cyanotypes.
meanings.sent5: The cyanotypes captured the essence of nature in stunning blue hues.

meanings.sent1: She collected vintage cyanotypes from the early 1900s.
meanings.sent2: The museum had a special exhibit featuring historic cyanotypes.
meanings.sent3: The cyanotypes on the wall seemed to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a gallery filled with cyanotypes of cherished moments.
meanings.sent5: The cyanotypes brought a touch of nostalgia to the room with their faded blue tones.
